openingHours.@value:
THE MUSEUM: Town Acre 445, Nelson
10:00am - 5:00pm weekdays
10:00am - 4:30pm weekends

RESEARCH FACILITY: Isel Park, Stoke
12.30pm to 4.30pm Tuesday to Friday, by appointment.
IL Museo: Acro città 445, Nelson 10:0-17:0 giorni feriali 10:0-16:30 week-end RESEARCH FACILITY: Isel Park, Stoke 12:30 a 16:30 dal martedì al venerdì, previo appuntamento.
博物馆: 镇英亩 445，尼尔森 10:0 上午-5:0 下午平日 10:0 上午-4:30 下午周末研究设施: Isel 公园斯托克 12:30 下午到 4:30 下午星期二至星期五，预约。
DEL Museo: Ciudad Acre 445, Nelson lunes a viernes 10:00-17:00 10:00-16:30 los fines de semana centro de investigación: Parque Isel, alimenta 12:30 a 16:30 del martes al viernes, previa cita.
O Museu: Cidade Acre 445, Nelson dias úteis 10:00-17:00 10:00-16:30 nos finais de semana o centro de pesquisa: Parque Isel, Stoke 12:30 a 16:30 terça-feira a sexta-feira, com hora marcada.
博物館: エーカー町 445、ネルソン ・ 10:00-17:00 平日 10:00-16:30 週末研究施設: アイセル公園予定で 12:30 に 16:30 火曜 ~ 金曜をかき立てます。

Музей: Город Акко 445, Нельсон 10:00 - 5:00 вечера по будням 10:00 утра - 4:30 pm выходные научно-исследовательский центр: Isel парк, сток 12.30 до 16.30 со вторника по пятницу, по предварительной записи.
DAS MUSEUM: Stadt Akkon 445, Nelson 10:00-17:00 von 10:00-16:30 Wochenenden FORSCHUNGSEINRICHTUNG versandfertig: Isel Park, Stoke 12:30 bis 16:30 Dienstag bis Freitag nach Vereinbarung.
LE Musée : Ville Acre 445, Nelson en semaine de 10:00-17:00 10:00-16:30 week-ends RESEARCH FACILITY : parc Isel, Stoke 12:30 à 16:30 du mardi au vendredi, sur rendez-vous.

Muzium: Bandar ekar 445, Nelson 10:00 am - 5:00 petang hari Isnin hingga Jumaat 10:00 am - 4:30 petang hujung minggu kajian: Isel Park, Stoke 12.30 untuk 4.30 petang Selasa hingga Jumaat, dengan pelantikan.

description.@value:
THE MUSEUM: Town Acre 445, Nelson
Admission to regional history gallery is free for Nelson Tasman ratepayers. Visitng adults $7, children $3, families $20max. Admission charges may apply to temporary exhibitions.

RESEARCH FACILITY: Isel Park, Stoke
Admission donations are appreciated. Research and reproduction fees may apply.
